Who we are

A24 is an American independent entertainment company based in New York City. It specializes in film distribution and television production.

Their films have been nominated for hundreds of awards and won many of them, including two Golden Globes for Best Motion Picture (one in Drama, one in Musical and Comedy) and an Academy Award for Best Film.
